info.name: Everquest Allakhazam Dark Theme
info.description: A dark theme for the everquest allakhazam site.
info.additionalInfo:
7-10-18 - Made some updates to text color within some admin only areas.
7-10-18 - Fixed some colors of links while looking at the news update items and the space in between those links.
7-12-18 - Fixed top banner ad and lower banner ad from showing a parchment image background.
8-6-18 - Fixed a couple link hover over colors and some div border colors.
8-13-18 - Fixed the hover text color of the top main menus.
9-27-18 - Fixed where the site won't load a white background between page loads.
10-13-18 - Added dark backgrounds for areas where ads display.
10-15-18 - Some of the progression server pages were changed to have a div background which resulted in a light background replacing the dark. That has been fixed.
10-18-18 - Fix some parchment backgrounds from showing up due to some ad changes.
10-26-18 - Fixed NPC page background color due to some changes I did to that page.
10-29-18 - Fixed span #808080 color from overriding other colored span tags.
3-4-19 - Fixed wiki background on windows chrome browsers to not have a textured background if you make the browser smaller.
12-23-19 - Fixed border colors for tables and td's in those tables.
1-23-20 - Fixed background color on spell page for infobox.
